Action.author: guoger
Action.body: Looking at log txt, I think this is benign, as we still have kafka option in both {{orderer.yaml}} and {{configtx.yaml}}, and we have some default values hardcoded, which are printed in logs.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: If you have reviewed all the logs and confirmed they are benign, then that is great; it would reduce this to simply a usability issue (confusing people) that can be cleaned up with appropriate priority.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: There is indeed a usability issue here. This touches on a bigger problem around how we parse configuration which may not be addressed any time soon. It's on the radar though.
